name: Forest Fire (Pedifi)
description:
Made for GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 All assets musics, sprites, codes etc. are made in one week by myself :D

The theme was one time use so you can only light up yourself once per level :]

Forest fire is a  puzzle game that uses "hot" mechanics :]

WASD or arrow keys to  move

hold space to light up

R to retry

ESC to open pause menu

If you get stuck there is a skip button on the pause menu

[Note: Please protect the forests and nature plant a tree  keep the nature safe :D]
